column4: how can i see how much is used of what drive in a nice way in feisty please?
df -h
ty

df -h doesn't show your windows partition!?
it shows one 18 GB drive (i have 2 of 17 or 18 GB, one for windows, one for ubuntu)
and the info is faulty too :s 1,9GB used, and i used more on both partitions
can you dual boot?
yeah everything works like it should lol
weird.
is there anything with a GUI ?
not that I'm familiar with, I always use df.
ok no prob n2diy
system-prefrences-disk, works here on Dapper
doesnt exist here
